column4: I've heard that Lubuntu has really come a long way within the last release
I'm gonna have to check it out one of these days...
it was "okay" last time I looked.  I used to run a Gnome2 on :0 and LXDE on :1, worked pretty well.  Not the commonest configuration though :)
I completely failed to get it switching properly when I moved to a 4-headed setup, so I abandoned it
